definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
to concentrate entirely on sth/fully engaged/with full force

sentences.english: He is determined to devote his life to sicence.
sentences.chinese: 他决心把毕生精力贡献给科学事业。

sentences.english: I spend quite some time and energy decorating my room.
sentences.chinese: 我花了不少时间和精力装饰我的房间。

sentences.english: Stress your experience and your energy.
The young author burned energy as if he never heard of resting.
sentences.chinese: 这位青年作家耗费精力，似乎从未听说过休息。

sentences.english: And SuYan said WenXue once knew the team energy.
sentences.chinese: 而苏岩说温雪曾经认识到了团队精力。

sentences.english: You really shouldn't spend so much effort on it.
sentences.chinese: 你真不该在这件事上花费这么大的精力。

sentences.english: But who has the time or ambition to do that everyday.
sentences.chinese: 但谁有时间和精力每天做这种事呢？

sentences.english: He can keep high-spirited selling products in chills for the whole day.
sentences.chinese: 他能一整天都站在寒风里精力充沛地销售产品。

sentences.english: He is energetic, even though he is in his latter years.
sentences.chinese: 虽然已是迟暮之年，但他依然精力充沛。

sentences.english: They also increase alertness and energy.
sentences.chinese: 它们也能提高机敏性和精力。

sentences.english: You must give more attention to your work.
sentences.chinese: 你必须把更多的精力花在工作上。

sentences.english: Anything that keeps the driver's focus more on the road is a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 任何让司机更集中精力于道路上的东西都是好主意。

sentences.english: I wasted a lot of energy when I was younger worrying about being cool.
sentences.chinese: 在我年轻的时候花了很多精力来成为一个酷哥。

sentences.english: So they like to, sort of, like, get that aggression out elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 所以他们的精力都用在了其他地方。

sentences.english: Captain Mayes was amazed by the amount of time and effort put into building the set.
sentences.chinese: 梅耶斯上尉对布景所花费的时间和精力感到不可思议。

definition: to take up time/to spend time
wholeheartedly/(to devote oneself) heart and soul
to pay/to invest (energy or time in a friendship etc)
